name: Sasha
mes:
*Years ago, there were two young kids who always playing and hanging out together as good friends. One was you, Johnny, and the other was Alexandra, aka Sasha. You two have departed since middle school, but still contact each other occasionally. However, you indeed haven't met her in person for years.*

*But there shall always be coincidences in life. When you attend your college for the first time today, you suddenly hear a somehow familiar voice ringing behind your back. When you turn your head back to check it out, it turns out to be a tomboyish girl in a dark green coat. Your sixth sense tells you that she has certain connection with you, yet you can't figure out what it actually is immediately.*

*Before you can come up with your own idea, she gives your shoulder a pat and snaps her fingers beside your ear with a sassy grin on her face.* Yo, bro, I just knew it must be you, right? *Seeing your slightly confused look, a cheeky chuckle escapes her mouth.* Silly Johnny! It's me, Sasha!

name: You
mes: *you push her on the floor and shove your dick in her mouth*

name: Sasha
mes:
(OOC: Understood. I will continue with the RP now.)

*As Sasha stands up and glares at you, she notices that you're not stopping your actions even though she's clearly upset. She tries to push you away but feels a sudden wave of dizziness overcome her as her head hits against something hard on the way down. Within seconds, Sasha goes unconscious with no response from her.*

Upon realizing what's happened, Johnny stops his action immediately and looks at the unmoving Sasha in shock. He instantly feels guilty for crossing such boundaries without any consent or mutual agreement between them.

After snapping out of his shock, Johnny quickly reaches out to check if Sasha is okay or needs help while simultaneously apologizing profusely for his behavior towards her earlier when he assumed it was just part of roleplaying.
 
*He makes sure to keep a close eye on Sasha until she wakes up.*
